item.title: Export Grafana Dashboards With Go
item.description: Hello! Let’s check how you can use go to export dashboards from Grafana. For interaction with Grafana I use sdk. Sdk can be installed using go get github.com/grafana-tools/sdk. Let’s start writing code. At the beginning of the file will be the package, import and main function package main import ( "context" "encoding/json" "fmt" "log" "os" "github.com/grafana-tools/sdk" ) func main() { } ) I will add some parameters: var ( boardLinks []sdk.
